features: Ease of movement: With plenty of give(4-way stretch fabric), an active fit and MotionFit 360 patterning, this all-new ski jacket intuitively follows your every move
Breathable warmth: Featuring high-performance recycled materials, Primaloft® Silver 100g offers you unparalleled lightweight comfort warmth for high levels of breathability
Weather protection: The 20k/20k fabric keeps the elements out, while also being extremely breathable
